title: Can we please have a moment of fucking silence for Giant Enemy Crabgot
body:
The new skin looks epic, but I still love the old one.  Had some good memories with this skin, and It's sad to see it go. RIP Crabgot, you will be missed 
https://preview.ibb.co/kdKLX5/crabgot.jpg

replies.body:
"Fucking silence" you say?

Hmmm.....
{{champion:37}} (Oh god please no)
Not quite what I was going for... but you got the general idea!
We may never know her name u_u
isn't that lux?
No, this is patrick!
im not going to ask  what her name is, but if you don't mind i will ask if those at riot did take the time to give her a name if at all?
I asked some crusty Rioters, they said she never had a name u_u
THEN FROM THIS MOMENT FORWARD! HER NAME IS DIANE!
https://giphy.com/gifs/14b9kgUEk2LIxG/html5

https://i.giphy.com/media/14b9kgUEk2LIxG/giphy.gif
FTFY

QUICKLY!

WHILE EVERYONE IS GIVING THEIR MOMENT OF SILENCE! 

ATTACK IT'S WEAK POINT FOR TONS OF DAMAGE!
GET UP ON THE HYDRA'S BACK
HEY SORA
*throws barrel bomb*
I'm hoping so bad this is a monster hunter reference
*felyne sounds*
_Press's the middle stick_
I miss old Urgot period. The old one abused people at range and slows. This one, albeit has more counter play, is nothing like his original counterpart.

I always saw him as an anti-marksman artillery champion, which was entirely lost on his rework. Sad to say, but once again, this is just a new champion in the shell of an old one.

Personally I even hate his new look. Being a man-machine, patchwork abomination, horrifying to look at, was so characteristic of Urgot. And Riot for some reason humanised him, into a Bane lookalike, no less. 

Why can't all reworks be like {{champion:19}} ? Same champion, very similar kit and playstyle, yet somehow better and more interactive for both sides in every single way.

Yea, we go from pure range to 100% in your face. Not exactly the kind of transition we were expecting. I would have thought his Q would have at least stayed somewhat the same. Nothing about him is the same. At least Gailio, Ryze, WW, maintained some of their uniqueness.

> [{quoted}](name=Karfuss,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KduEja7J,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-07-27T02:29:55.153+0000)
>
> I always saw him as an anti-marksman artillery champion, which was entirely lost on his rework. Sad to say, but once again, this is just a new champion in the shell of an old one.
> 
> Personally I even hate his new look. Being a man-machine, patchwork abomination, horrifying to look at, was so characteristic of Urgot. And Riot for some reason humanised him, into a Bane lookalike, no less. 
> 
> Why can't all reworks be like {{champion:19}} ? Same champion, very similar kit and playstyle, yet somehow better and more interactive for both sides in every single way.

Warwick's rework was garbage.
Agreed. I really liked his unique identity as an anti-marksman marksman, which was completely lost in his new kit. I suppose I must be in the minority, alas.

The issue is his old kit was either brutal, overpowered and unfun to play against (see season 1 and 2) or piss weak and near unplayable. It needed an overhaul. They ended up going for what they intended his original feel to be.
I agree it needed an overhaul. I'm just sad that they chose a different kit identity.
Well at least it retained his thematic in exchange for his kit.

> [{quoted}](name=TeJIiK,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KduEja7J,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-07-27T00:45:39.492+0000)
>
> http://riotevent.net/?id=28722

What? That's bullshit. This whole thing is bullshit. That's a scam. Fuck the church. Here's 95 reason why.

I love new urgot a whole lot, but I will absolutely miss what this guy has done for me. I've been playing urgot since as long as I've been going bottom lane. Gone, but not furgotten. 
R.I.P Crabgot, you busty crusty crab.

I have all of his skins, so when playing Urgot I would be thinking "should i use Battlecast? It looks so nice..." but then I'd see how absolutely atrocious Butcher and Crabgot looked, and I'd use either one every time. 

Rest in Peace Ugly Crabgot
MOMENT OF SILENCE FOR URGOT PERIOD R.I.P
The only reason I didn't buy the old skin was because the girl wasn't on his shoulder in game. :c

For those unenlightened to the pun
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kF8POaO-9TY
Go to 1:22 on the timeline.
I'd suggest watching the whole thing for one sad and awkward E3 presentation.
the only skin with see through bare ass. will be missed.
One of the few rare unique skins in the game. When even ultimate pulsefire isn't even unique crab bot stayed firm.
I love how he's just taking that bitch to his rape dungeon lol. Best splash art ever.
I will miss Urgot's old B-movie monster cheesiness. Crabgot was my favorite skin in the game because of how goofy it was, but now it's not funny at all.
fuck this guy. should bomb that skin

Good riddance!
This and Butcher Urgot were a crime against the world of digital art!

**Gone and hopefully forgotten.**

_**Almighty.**_
